name: utkarsh-utility-tasks
description: Generate secret variables for the strings specified based on the secret preferences

scripts.init: npm run init:root && npm run init:tasks
scripts.copy: npm run clean-dist && copyfiles "./tasks/**/!(*.ts|*.js.map|package-lock.json)" dist && copyfiles vss-extension.json LICENSE *.md dist && copyfiles images/**/* dist
scripts.init:tasks: glob-exec --parallel --foreach "./tasks/**/task.json" -- "cd {{file.dir}} && npm install --no-update-notifier --no-progress && npm dedupe && npm prune --production && npm audit fix"

author: onlyutkarsh
